blueDash 0.3.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

argonDash

blue dashboard template

Installation

install.packages("blueR")
# devel version
devtools::install_github("RinteRface/blueDash")
# from CRAN
install.packages("blueDash")

Demo

See a demonstration on an open source shiny server here. In addition to free RStudio products, argonDash also runs on shinyapps.io and RStudio Connect, as well as on shiny server pro.

argonDashGallery()

Vertical layout


Horizontal layout

This layout is experimental.


Aknowledgement

  • Creative Tim for designing the original blue dashboard HTML template

Code of Conduct

Please note that the blueDash project is released with a Contributor Code of Conduct. By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.
